summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 21702 entitled: "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, extending, altering and establishing of Ninth Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Barrett Street; of Eighth Avenue West, from West Halladay Street to the north margin of West Ray Street; of West Ray Street, from the east margin of Eighth Avenue West to a point sixty-eight and eight one-hundredths (68.08) feet east from said east margin; and of West Halladay Street, from Eighth Avenue West to Ninth Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle; and providing the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary threfor; and providing that the payment of such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law," Approved the 24th day of August, 1909.
